channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's funding memo doesn't block individual assistance, White House says

item.title: Israel says Netanyahu invited to meet Trump at White House next week
item.description: The 4 February meeting would come after comments from Trump on relocating Palestinians to Egypt and Jordan.

item.title: Trump fires labor board officials, setting up legal fight

item.title: Danish PM in whirlwind EU trip as Greenland unease grows
item.description: The Danish PM's tour of three capitals betrayed the nervousness felt in Denmark over Trump's repeated comments.

item.title: Immigration officers are operating with a new sense of mission. Now, ‘nobody gets a free pass’

item.title: Medicaid, Head Start, health centers locked out of federal funding site
item.description: The online system for federal health funding now warns of delays due to executive orders after the Trump administration announced a freeze.

item.title: What has changed with immigration under Trump and what is still playing out?

item.title: Trump issues order to ban transgender troops from serving openly in the military

item.title: Mona Lisa to be moved as part of major Louvre overhaul
item.description: France's president says a second museum entrance will be built, while non-EU residents will also pay more to visit.

item.title: Did you plan to buy a home -- but found renting is cheaper? We want to hear from you

item.title: 'Don't overdo it, Steve': BBC journalist in testy exchange with Belarus president

item.title: Are no-penalty CD accounts worth it for 2025?
item.description: A no-penalty CD could be valuable for some savers this year. Here's what to consider right now.

item.title: US tech stocks steady after DeepSeek AI app shock
item.description: DeepSeek's claim that its model was made at a fraction of the cost of its rivals has rocked the AI industry.

item.title: DeepSeek: Did a little known Chinese startup cause a 'Sputnik moment' for AI?
item.description: Buzz around DeepSeek built into a wave of concern that hammered tech stocks on Monday.
